text: Ni tachiwecheta awala wawapedwile umanyilisi ni chikulupi kuti: “Chisimu wanganyammwe mwatemi m’chilamusi cha Allah kwikanila lisiku lyakuwukulidwa (m’malembe), sambano ali ni lisiku lyakuwukulidwa (m’malembe alila lyamwalikanilaga), nambo wanganyammwe mwaliji nkakumanyilila (yakupatikana kwakwe).”
